Das Spiel ist ein sehr gutes Puzzle Spiel! Wer das Spiel richtig verstehen will muss den ersten Teil erstmal spielen! Aber dass spiel hat einen unbeschreibbaren Humor. Die Grafik und der Schwierigkeitsgrad sind samt ganz gut, und es wird nie zu schwer! Auch nebensächlich mit einem tollen Co-op modus und einem genialen Editor, bietet das Spiel mehr als 40H großartigen Spielspaß! Eine sehr große Empfelung. Doch hier ein paar schwachpunkte. Die Ladezeiten kommen zu oft und dauern auch lange! Das Spiel ist etwas zu kurz als Nachfoleger. Trotzdem ein echt geiles spiel! Auf jedenfall eine Empfelung wert!
The earth is 4.6 billion years old and we managed to exist at the same time as this masterpiece.

Oyun genel olarak bir bulmaca oyunu. Hikayesi Portal serisinin ilk oyunu ile bağlantılı o yüzden bunu oynamadan önce ilk oyunu oynamanızı şiddetle tavsiye ederim. Oyunun hikayesi ve monologlar çok güzel yazılmış. Gerçekten eğlenceli bir 8 saat geçirdim oynarken. İlk oyunla kıyaslayacak olursak, bu oyun ilkinden çok daha uzun. Yaklaşık 2 katı sürede bitirdim. İlk oyuna nazaran daha fazla bulmacaya katkı sunacak şey eklemişler o yüzden haritalar bazen zorlayıcı olabiliyordu. Genel olarak toparlamak gerekirse eğlenceli ve kesinlikle fiyatını karşılayan kült bir oyun. Tavsiye ederim.

Easily one of my favorite games of all time. As of now I've beat the single player campaign roughly 3 times and the multiplayer one like 4 times (and only recently found out there was a part 2). This is such a finely crafted game that I had to get all 51 achievements, just as a testament to how much I love this game. Challenging, great learning curve, inventive, simple yet complex, AND the ability for fans to make their own levels. After this, I'm satisfied with not getting a Portal 3 (although Portal Stories: Mel was pretty much that).

Anyway this game is a masterpiece, I can't describe how much I love it, and I wouldn't do a thing to change it.
Very fun. Story's great, so are the graphics. It even has a level creator!
best puzzle game ever and really challenging with a great story line if you can find the secrets if you cant find the secrets search up Game Theory Portal

Logiczna gra FPS z genialną fabułą. Klimat przypomina nieco pierwsze Fallout`y skrzyżowane z Half Life.  Gra zaskakuje wielokrotnie świetnymi pomysłami mechanicznymi, poczuciem humoru. Majstersztyk również jeśli chodzi o voice acting i udźwiękowienie. Doskonale spędzone kilkanaście godzin.

Definitely a unique puzzle game that challenges your mind. The one MAJOR thing I dislike about this game is that you have to find ways to shut off the voice chat; it is REALLY ANNOYING because the sound quality is crappy in-game. My buddy and I tried going thru steam to lower the volume all the way (hasn't worked) on the mic and also tried making it Push to Talk in-game but still, the issue persists. Other than that, the game is hella fun. P.S. If anyone has succeeded in a work around to shut off the mic while in-game and allow voice only in Discord let me know!
